credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Olympus
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor on textured laid paper
description: Jupiter on throne in center middle-distance in front of temple with inscription: Eternita.  Jupiter flanked by woman with cornucopia, Mars, beside whom, genii fly upon clouds. Sit at left: Neptune, Athena, Mercury; at right: Apollo, Aesculapius, Hercules. Altar dedicated to "Pace" stands in center foreground. From left, procession of putti and women with symbols of peaceful occupations; from right, procession of putti and warriors with arms.
name: Drawing
